comment.author: 63468133@N03
comment._content: This was my Grandfathers Store. I have some advertisements, old bottles and other stuff from here. My Brother has the cash register (still working). didn't know this existed. Awesome.

comment.author: 87505944@N08
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/63468133@N03] I was cleaning things out and just came across a token for Tyler's Store in Campton, KY. It is good for 5 in merchandise. Now don't know if that is 5 cents or 5 dollars. I'd be glad to send it to you since you were related.
Betty Reese
